summary: Adds Draugr summons as conjuration spells. Now you can summon almost any type of draugr! It is balanced because you can\'t be a novice at conjuration and summon a Death Lord
descriptionHtml: Adds Draugr summons as conjuration spells. Now you can summon almost any type of draugr! It is balanced because you can\'t be a novice at conjuration and summon a Death Lord. You have to smith the spell tomes if you want them. I know it doesn\'t make sense but I don\'t want to conflict with other mods and put it in some merchant\'s inventory. Just have alot of septims and a forge ready and you can summon Draugr!!
author: LivingDead234
